short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clip product images and information to use in model product for Ohana.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making creating your dream model that much easier for both the buyer and builder.  Add the products and finishes that you are looking to have in your new model on the Ohana platform.  Buyers add finishes and materials you would like incorporated into your model.  Builders add materials and finishes that you would like to highlight and feature in your models.  Users must be registered on the Ohana Dwellings Platform to save items to their vision boards.
